daily_fact: Stay engaged with your community through local news and civic participation.
topline_md: New York City faces a blood emergency as the New York Blood Center calls for donations, while a tire shop fire in Queens injures nine and forecasters warn of a frigid week ahead. Additionally, Mayor Mamdani's administration continues to implement significant policy changes, including a crackdown on delivery apps and a ban on credit checks for employers.
